channel.title: Christin, Nicolas on Chege's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Christin, Nicolas on Chege's Blog

item.title: Online Markets
item.description: WWW ‘21: The Web Conference 2021 REST: Relational Event-Driven Stock Trend Forecasting REST, an event-driven stock trend forecasting framework, that overcomes two limitations of existing event-driven models. Models the stock context, and learns the effect of event information on the stocks under different contexts. Constructs a stock graph and designs a new propagation layer to propagate the effect of event information from related stocks. The value of stock trend forecasting is not unanimous, e.
